body.head.byline: By Bill Carter and Jim Rutenberg

abstract.p: Roundup of recent advertising account changes (S)

block.p: * VTech Electronics, Hong Kong, which makes developmental learning products, to Merkley Newman Harty & Partners, New York, part of the Omnicom Group, as its first global agency of record. The London office of TBWA Worldwide, an Omnicom sibling, will coordinate European work. Combined spending was estimated at $20 million. * FleetBoston Financial to the GlobalWorks Group, New York, as its first multicultural agency of record. Spending was not disclosed.
